CN.content:

Let's think step by step.

The "Material Name" entities in the paragraph are:

1. N-octyl-2,7-dithia-5-azacyclopenta[a]-pentalene-4,6-dione (DTPD)
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

Sure, my apologies. Here are the Material Name entities in the paragraph:

1. DTPD

The entity "N-octyl-2,7-dithia-5-azacyclopenta[a]-pentalene-4,6-dione" is the full name of the material, and "DTPD" is an abbreviation or shortened name for the same material.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Sure, here's the Material Name entity in the paragraph presented in a Markdown table:

| Material Name |
| --- |
| DTPD |

Note that the full name of the material, "N-octyl-2,7-dithia-5-azacyclopenta[a]-pentalene-4,6-dione", is not included in the table as it was not specified as a separate entity in the original paragraph.
